BeforeGame.CharacterA: Bro, remember that in the <color=blue>Gravity world</color>, the gravity is abnormally high.

InGame.CharacterB: Young lady, I know that president Jumbo has asked you to take the Gravity Heart.
InGame.CharacterA: Affirmative, your majesty. So could you please(┐ ◟;*д*)ノ
InGame.CharacterB: Negative. I don't believe in that guy or you. Only those who are brave enough to invert the gravity and conquer the Gravity Trail can be the keeper of Gravity Heart.
InGame.CharacterA: (Gravity Trail? I think that's the road ahead.)

AfterGame.CharacterB: You have earned my respect, brave lady. Maybe the ones from <color=red>Jump</color> aren't all that coward.
